The brand new mainline Gen Pokémon Nintendo Switch 2 games have been officially revealed. As one would expect and just about everyone hoped for, the new Pokémon Winds and Pokémon Waves headlined this morning’s Pokémon Presents showcase and really finished the show off with a bang. We have already featured the reveal of the two games, but a series of additional details have emerged since then, so let’s dive in!

items.title: Automate lawn care with the Husqvarna Automower 115H 4G robot mower at a super affordable new $300 low ($399 off)
items.summary:
Amazon is offering folks one of the most affordable means to automate their lawncare in the form of the Husqvarna Automower 115H 4G Robotic Lawn Mower that has dropped down to $299.99 shipped. It’s dropping down from a full $699 price tag here, repeating the first iteration of this deal that only lasted for a single day at the start of this week, which may also hint at this second-chance steal only lasting as long. While the savings last, you’re getting $399 cut from this older legacy model’s tag, which not only has stood the test of time on the market, but gives you the all-time lowest price that we have tracked that beats out more expensive alternate models like the legacy Worx Landroid or newer options like the Anker eufy E15/E18 models, as well as the latest Segway Navimow series robots that have ongoing launch deals from the beginning of February.

items.title: EGO’s advanced 21-inch cordless electric Touch Drive self-propelled mower with 2x batteries at $669 ($100 off), more from $449
items.summary:
Amazon has a collection of discounts for the first time in 2026 on three tiers of EGO Power+ cordless electric lawn mowers, with the most advanced being the EGO 56V 21-inch Cordless Electric Self-Propelled Touch Drive Lawn Mower that comes with 6.0Ah and 4.0Ah batteries at $669 shipped. Normally $769 at full price, it’s been holding out at its MSRP since Cyber Monday deals ended in early December, with today’s deal giving you a $100 markdown off the going rate. For cheaper alternatives, you can also find the 56V 21-inch Cordless Electric Self-Propelled Dual Toggle Lawn Mower with a 6.0Ah battery at $529 shipped, down from $599, or a more standard 56V 21-inch Cordless Electric Lawn Mower with a 6.0Ah battery at $449 shipped, down from $499.

items.title: Save $300 and hop on Segway’s Max G2 e-scooter with Apple Find My, Bluetooth locking, and a 43-mile range at $700
items.summary:
Segway has brought back a number of discounts on its e-scooter lineup, with a notable continuing of the Max G2 Electric Scooter at $699.99 shipped, which is not currently available at Amazon. It’s been marked down from its $1,400 MSRP, though on average you can often find it starting lower around $1,000, with this particular price having been holding out since the start of February. The $300 savings have endured despite its counterparts fluctuating with discounts, giving you an ongoing chance to score it at the second-lowest recurring price that is beaten by the $650 rate we last saw during Christmas sales, and the third-lowest price overall behind that Christmas pricing and a one-time-only drop to $530 from early December. You can also shop all the other e-scooters from Segway on the landing page here.

items.title: Anker’s 72-hour SOLIX flash sale drops C2000 Gen 2 power station to $779 ($719 off) + up to 48% off other new models
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has extended its Winter Power Deals sale, which also now includes a 72-hour flash sale that is taking up to $2,300 off three of its newest power station models alongside an expansion battery for the most modular of these portable options. The mid-tier option in this lineup is Anker’s SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station at $779 shipped, and you’ll get a free tote bag, which also matches the pricing over at the brand’s Amazon storefront (without the bag). You may notice a $1,498 MSRP, but it’s only really climbed as high as $850 at Amazon over the first two months of 2026, with a single spike up to its MSRP that we saw in mid-January. While the price has gone a little lower in the past, with the all-time low having last appeared in November, you’re still getting a solid 48% markdown here that cuts $719 off the tag for the third-best price we have tracked – just $100 above the Black Friday low. You can learn more about this model in our hands-on review here, or head below where the other flash offers are also located for your perusal.

more…
